DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION: Custom EN: We use %TECHNOLOGY_NAME% to embed content that may collect data about your activity. Please review the details and accept the service to see this content.
DEFAULT_TITLE: Custom EN: We need your consent to load the %TECHNOLOGY_NAME% service!
FACEBOOK_DESCRIPTION: Custom EN: We use Facebook to embed content that may collect data about your activity. Please review the details and accept the service to view Facebook content.
MAP_DESCRIPTION: Custom EN: We use a third party service to embed map content that may collect data about your activity. Please review the details and accept the service to see this map.
MIXCLOUD_DESCRIPTION: Custom EN: We use the Mixcloud music service. This service may collect data about your activity. Please review the details and accept the service to activate Mix cloud service.
NOT_PERMITTED_TEXT: Custom EN: This content is not permitted to load due to trackers that are not disclosed to the visitor. The website owner needs to setup the site with their CMP to add this content to the list of technologies used.
PAYPAL_DESCRIPTION: Custom EN: We use the payment provider PayPal. This service may collect data about your activity. Please review the details and accept the service to activate PayPal payment.
POWERED_BY: Custom EN: powered by Usercentrics Consent Management Platform
RECAPTCHA_ALERT: Custom EN: You have to give your Consent to Recaptcha first!
RECAPTCHA_DESCRIPTION: Custom EN: We use reCAPTCHA to check your entered information. This service may collect data about your activity. Please review the details and accept the service to proceed.
VIDEO_DESCRIPTION: Custom EN: We use a third party service to embed video content that may collect data about your activity. Please review the details and accept the service to watch this video.
XING_DESCRIPTION: Custom EN: We use XING Events to provide our ticketing service. This service may collect data about your activity. Please review the details and accept the service to open the ticketing service.
